revision.comment: /* top */clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix, SK SK hynix → SK hynix
revision.text:
{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = Archer-C3150(UN)2.0-02.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = AC3150 Wireless MU-MIMO Gigabit Router |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = http://www.tp-link.com/en/products/details/Archer-C3150.html |sp = https://www.tp-link.com/en/support/download/Archer-C3150_V2/ |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = TP-LINK_Archer_C3150_v2.x |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = TP-LINK |model = Archer C3150 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = v2.x |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AC3150 |series = Archer C3150 |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = TE7C3150V2 |icid = 8853A-C3150V2 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = 2050500681 |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4709C0;BCM4709C0KFEBG; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex A9 |cpu1spd = 1.4 GHz |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Winbond;W25Q256FGFV; |flash1size = 32 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 256 |ram1chip = SK hynix;H5TQ2G63FFR-PBC; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 3.0, USB 2.0 |exp_usb_num = 2 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Wave2, MU-MIMO, Link Aggregation, 1024QAM, acqam, |addchip = 2.4GHz RF Power Amplifier;Skyworks;SE2623L;;4; ,,, 2.4GHz SPDT switch w/ LNA;Skyworks;SKY85201-11;;4; ,,, 5GHz RF Power Amplifier;RFMD;RFPA5542;;4; ,,, 5GHz SPDT switch w/ LNA;Skyworks;SKY85605-11;;4; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |is_manuf = Yes |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = End of Life |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 02/17/2017 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = N82E16833704344 |asin = B01N4R01UJ |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4366;BCM4366KMMLG; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL,RP-SMA |rad1txchains = 4 |rad1rxchains = 4 |rad1sstreams = 4 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam1 = 1000 |rad1n = 600 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4366;BCM4366KMMLG; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL,RP-SMA |rad2txchains = 4 |rad2rxchains = 4 |rad2sstreams = 4 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |acqam2 = 2167 |rad2ac = 1733 |rad2n = 600 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5 |rad2correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad2cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "2050500681" and "1707" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
*[[TP-LINK Archer C3150]] - ''AC3150 Wireless MU-MIMO Gigabit Router'' :• FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TE7C3150 TE7C3150] (11/20/2015) :2167Mbps (5GHz) / 1000Mbps (2.4GHz), 4x4 [[Broadcom acqam]] (1024-QAM) :[[Broadcom]] @1.4GHz Dual Core CPU, Wi-Fi Co-Processors in each radio *[[TP-LINK Archer C3150 v2.x]] - ''AC3150 Wireless MU-MIMO Gigabit Router'' :• FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TE7C3150V2 TE7C3150V2] (02/17/2017) - [https://fccid.io/TE7C3150V2/Internal-Photos/Internal-Photo-3286002.html FCC images] :Flash: ''Winbond'' W25Q256FGFV (32MB)
==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/33006-tp-link-ac3150-wireless-mu-mimo-gigabit-router-reviewed ''TP-LINK AC3150 Wireless MU-MIMO Gigabit Router'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] *[https://www.digitalcitizen.life/review-tp-link-archer-c3150-v2 ''Reviewing the TP-Link Archer C3150 v2: Is the new version a significant upgrade?'' on '''Digital Citizen''']
==Pictures== <center>'''Retail Images''' <gallery> File:Archer-C3150(UN)2.0-01.jpg| File:Archer-C3150(UN)2.0-02.jpg| File:Archer-C3150(UN)2.0-03.jpg| File:Archer-C3150(UN)2.0-04.jpg| File:Archer-C3150(UN)2.0-05.jpg| File:Archer-C3150(UN)2.0-06.jpg| File:Archer-C3150(UN)-1.0-pkg.jpg| </gallery></center>[[Has images::retail| ]][[Has images::external| ]]
==See also== *[[TP-LINK Archer C5400 v1.x]] - ''AC5400 Tri-Band WiFi Gigabit Router'' :• FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TE7C5400 TE7C5400] ''AC5300 Tri-Band Wi-Fi Gigabit Router'' • [http://www.tp-link.com/en/products/details/cat-9_Archer-C5400.html PPage] :2x 2167Mbps (5GHz) / 1000Mbps (2.4GHz), 4x4 [[Broadcom]] 1024-QAM :[[Broadcom]] @1.4GHz dual core CPU, Wi-Fi co-processors in each radio *[[TP-LINK Archer C3200]] - ''AC3200 Wireless Dual Band Gigabit Router'' :• FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TE7C3200 TE7C3200] 2x 1300Mbps (5GHz) / 600Mbps (2.4GHz), [[Broadcom]] *[[TP-LINK Archer C2600 v1.x]] - ''AC2600 Wireless Dual Band Gigabit Router'' :• FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TE7C2600 TE7C2600], 1733Mbps (5GHz) / 800Mbps (2.4GHz), 4x4 AC [[QCA]]
